A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was shell-shocked after this movie and deeply in need of a glass of red wine.  That being said - I also need to go see it again.  One oddity is the flashback scenes in Awakens - have all these flashbacks been covered in Last Jedi? ! - and oddly there doesn't seem to be a pre-ordained character arc through three movies already designed or set out from the first movie that simply carried through.  Hamill's performance was likely shaped by the fact that this isn't a story he personally wanted\, one in which Luke is grumpier\, and in general simply \"less\".  That being said - the final part of the film\, Luke is literally akin to a God\, and a legend is born.
